title: Ghost Network Awakens
outcome: Three days after the latest coin revelations, a new wave of data coins appears throughout the city, now showing evolving personal messages and guidance from vanished citizens. As deciphering these coins becomes a citywide phenomenon, the Council discovers that Halden implanted a hidden peer-to-peer network in the system back in 2023. The network, now activated, lets the vanished communicate with the public and orchestrate encrypted acts of civil aid. The city divides between those who follow the guidance of the vanished and those still loyal to algorithmic order, as Council factions scramble to respond.

events.description: Mysterious new data coins appear in busy districts, this time emitting audio snippets and directions attributed to vanished citizens.
Council technical teams confirm the data coins use an old peer-to-peer network designed by Halden in early BCI experiments; the system allows the vanished to send guidance to the public.
Citizens begin coordinating resource sharing and support through instructions from the vanished, causing a sharp divide between pro-vanished and pro-Council groups.
Council meetings devolve into crisis talks as factions propose either to shut down the city’s networks or negotiate with representatives from the vanished.
Large-scale rallies form both for and against the guidance of the vanished; pro-vanished groups organize covert aid convoys, while Council loyalists stage counter-marches.
